  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(HumanPlayer human, ComputerPlayer computer, int size)
      Constructor with the two players (human and computer) and the size of the board as parameters
      Parameters:
      human - , HumanPlayer that plays the game. The "real" player
      computer - , ComputerPlayer that plays the game. It is like a "bot" player
      size - , int with dimension of the board
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the parameters are null or the dimension is < 10 or > 20

    • Game

      public Game(HumanPlayer leftPlayer, ComputerPlayer rightPlayer)
      Constructor with the two players (human and computer) as parameters. Creates the board with a default size of 10 squares per row and column
      Parameters:
      leftPlayer - , HumanPlayer that plays the game. The "real" player
      rightPlayer - , ComputerPlayer that plays the game. It is like a "bot" player
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the parameters are null

  • Method Details

    • setDebugMode

      public void setDebugMode(boolean gameMode)
      This method sets the value of the gameMode
      Parameters:
      gameMode - , boolean with true for debug mode and false for normal mode

    • play

      public void play()
      This method is the game loop, for each turn it will happen once It shows both boards, checks the turn, shows the name of the turnÂ´s player, shoots at the selected coordinate, prints the message of being shooting at the selected coordinate, prints if there was anything at the coordinate and checks if some has won
